title: Kathy Griffin throws attorney Lisa Bloom under the bus over that Trump press conference
text:
Is it possible for a conservative to feel bad for Kathy Griffin? She’s certainly been less than kind to conservatives, and that dead-eyed photo of her holding up a bloody facsimile of the president’s disembodied head, Taliban-style, wasn’t something his son needed to see.

So we really thought we had reached the end of the world — the bottom of the pit, at least — when Griffin announced that she was holding a press conference about the whole thing … with attorney Lisa Bloom, daughter of Gloria Allred. The press conference, held back in June 2017, was a disaster, but for some reason, Griffin is throwing Bloom under the bus Monday and saying she hadn’t even seen the “glamor shots” that had been tweeted out.

Who’s worse? You decide:

A) @LisaBloom suggested holding a press conference a couple days after the Trump photo scandal upended my life. As you can see, it turned out to be an infomercial for her firm in her office. I didn't know she had tweeted out this memo with glamour shots the night before. pic.twitter.com/mcGJayE6bp — Kathy Griffin (@kathygriffin) September 9, 2019

B) I have never called for a press conference in my life and trusted her. Do I look safe in the photo? It’s my understanding she didn’t vett anyone in attendance. Her office just sent out a mass email. I expected a small group of reporters from major outlets like the LA Times pic.twitter.com/MQlNC3O2qS — Kathy Griffin (@kathygriffin) September 9, 2019

C) While the LA Times was there, conservative trolls from random blogs also showed up and harassed me.She also invited press outlets like ET and and privately did interviews with them in the hallway without me. I was in her office with her husband who held the door closed. — Kathy Griffin (@kathygriffin) September 9, 2019

D) @LisaBloom charged me $40,000 for representation and advocacy🙄 I got a terrible press conference that did nothing but damage me. She never apologized for her conduct and unprofessionalism. When I asked for my money back, she refused. — Kathy Griffin (@kathygriffin) September 9, 2019

It was a train wreck.

E) Here’s @lisabloom on the day she resigned as Harvey Weinstein’s attorney. Lisa, I tried that therapy, turns out it didn’t stop two federal agencies from investigating me and considering charging me with the crime of conspiracy to assassinate the President of the United States pic.twitter.com/uGLJeyDL3A — Kathy Griffin (@kathygriffin) September 9, 2019

No one cares — BetseyCarolinaGirl (@GirlBetsey) September 9, 2019

Thoughts and prayers. — Jeni Peni (@peni_jeni) September 9, 2019

Serious question, what about her resume made you want to hire her? — K Sabrena (@KSabrena_) September 9, 2019

That is a very good question.

Like mother like daughter! Why anyone would trust either of them is beyond me! — sandy (@sgalicastro) September 9, 2019

This “comedian” is still desperately clinging to whatever tiny amount of relevance she once had. — RandomAsshole (@smarterdanyou) September 9, 2019

Much like that photo, I suspect this tweet isn't working out quite like you expected. — extrashaky (@extrashaky) September 9, 2019

Press conferences suck when the press that shows up asks actual questions and aren’t there to kow-tow. — @charliefromnyc 🦕 (@CharliefromNYC) September 9, 2019

Noooooo sympathy. — Kayyyy (@MidmodArtist) September 9, 2019

Your career had already been upended. This was just the cherry on top! pic.twitter.com/IrMoKDTj4r — Kevin Freedman (@freedman_kevin) September 9, 2019

After what she did to you, it seems to me she comes across as an opportunist more than a lawyer. Am I right? — Juan Camus (@juancamus) September 9, 2019

Lisa Bloom? You think?

Hey, can you pass me her card? I have this full dumpster I've been trying to set on fire for months, to no avail. I need a professional. — 8WK.me (@abpryor) September 9, 2019

Ah, yes, you are the victim…right… — Rocky is my Top (@hardknoxgrad04) September 9, 2019

Cry me a river. — Toko (@TraceTrance) September 9, 2019

I love every second of this sad sorry tweet. — Bass Layer (@lennyscards) September 9, 2019

Eating each other.. loving the feast — Anthony DePalma⭐⭐⭐ (@TonyxPalma) September 9, 2019
